creator: EnPal Lanugage Learning Co., Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Ready to learn English, but tired of textbooks? Try EnPal!

If you learned English in school, but forgot the basics...
If you're comfortable reading and writing in English, but your listening skills make you wish native speakers had subtitles on...
If you're just starting out, but already bored by monotonous textbooks exercises...

EnPal is the right choice for YOU!

EnPal is a new app for English learners which takes a fun and inventive approach to old school learning problems.

Here's what EnPal has to offer:
- Effective methods
- Practical phrases
- Authentic scenarios
- Bite-sized lessons
- Input and output
- No stress learning
- Suitable for all levels

- Effective methods


Some say that there are no shortcuts to fluency. At EnPal, we try to prove them wrong. EnPal will introduce, explain, and help you master a whole array of the most frequently used words and expressions. With our short & fun lessons, you'll be conversational in no time!

- Practical knowledge
All our learning points, from the most formal to the most casual, are actually used by native English speakers today. No more outdated vocabulary and old-fashioned phrasing!

- Authentic scenarios
Context, context, context! Find out how, when, and what to say to strangers, friends, coworkers, and family in real life situations. From ordering coffee to confessing your love, liven up the conversation with fun, practical expressions!

- Bite-sized lessons
Each lesson on EnPal takes less than 10 minutes to complete. It's fun, engaging, and perfect for busy people studying on the go!

- Input and output
Each learning point is presented by multiple speakers in a range of different voices, then assessed with intuitive listening, reading, writing, and speaking exercises. EnPal makes memorization easy!

- No stress learning
Scared of your English teacher? Can't communicate without breaking into a cold sweat? EnPal lets you learn and progress at your own pace. No judgement, no competition, no stress, only you and your English journey.

- Suitable for all levels
Whether you're a total beginner or stuck at intermediate level, EnPal has something for everyone. Colloquial speech, set expressions, tips for every day communication and so much more
- EnPal really has it all!
Learn English with ease. EnPal will be with you every step of the way.
descriptionShort: Fluent with movie clips, videos, games

title: FluenDay: English & Spanish

creator: ENPAL PTE. LTD.
descriptionHtml:
English or Spanish? With FluenDay, you can learn and improve both!

English and Spanish are two of the most popular choices for language learning worldwide. FluenDay is an app that will help you learn English and Spanish in a fun and inventive way.

Here's what FluenDay has to offer:

3000+ authentic foreign language CLIPSfrom your favorite movies and TV shows! FluenDay Clips come with reading & speaking exercises, context notes, and fun stories at the end of each unit that will help you improve your target language and reach fluency faster. Accessible to all learners on any level of language proficiency, Clips offer a unique glimpse into the natural spoken language used by native speakers today. If you're confident with textbook exercises, but struggle with casual speaking and listening in real life, FluenDay Clips is the best choice for you.

Comprehensive foreign language COURSESwhere each bite-sized lesson further improves your knowledge of key vocabulary & grammar. Complete with interactive exercises, FluenDay English and Spanish Courses present new knowledge in a well-structured way, helping language learners develop an intuitive grasp on the language and foster a clear understanding of grammar. Both English and Spanish courses offer succinct grammar tips, comprehensive exercises, easy-to-read stories, flashcards, and spaced repetition. FluenDay Courses are perfect for first-time learners, as well as those who want to brush up on the basics and go from there.

Top-tier selection of foreign language eBooksin text and audio formats, for visual and auditory learners alike. If you're ready to try reading and/or listening to books in your target language, give FluenDay eBooks a go. The built-in dictionary will make you make sense of the trickiest vocabulary words and expressions which you can save and review later. Make the best of this feature to improve your target language vocabulary and reading ability.

Engaging foreign language mini-games
for vocabulary and grammar practice. If you need motivation to keep learning, look no further! FluenDay games are intuitive, addictive, and capable of reinforcing key knowledge points as fast as any flashcards. Even five minutes a day is enough to keep you on your language learning toes with FluenDay games!


Learning foreign languages with FluenDay means effective methods, practical knowledge, and visible improvement.

Learn English and Spanish on your own terms.

Enjoy stress-free learning and reach fluency faster.

FluenDay will be with you every step of the way.


NOW AVAILABLE IN: Japanese, Russian, French, German, Korean, Vietnamese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese, Spanish, Turkish, Indonesian, Italian, Thai, and Arabic
